survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Air Quality Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on air quality in the workplace and its impact on productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the air quality in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: N/A - This is the first question.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction levels to maintain consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the air quality in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: N/A - This is the first question.

questions.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in the workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify common air quality concerns. Include an option for 'None of the above' for respondents without issues.

script.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in the workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How does workplace air quality affect your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure perceived impact on productivity. Helps correlate air quality with work performance.

script.question_text: How does workplace air quality affect your productivity?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving air quality in the workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Useful for identifying actionable improvements.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving air quality in the workplace?

questions.question_text: Do you use any personal devices (e.g., air purifiers, humidifiers) to improve air quality at your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge individual efforts to address air quality. Can inform policy decisions on providing such devices.

script.question_text: Do you use any personal devices (e.g., air purifiers, humidifiers) to improve air quality at your workspace?
